Package graph

graph package: a collection of classes for representing graphs, hyper-graphs and algorithms operating on such discrete finite structures.

Class Summary
AllMWCFinder The class computes all maximal weighted cliques in a Graph.
AllMWCFinderBK class provides an implementation of the Bron-Kerbosch algorithm for computing all maximal cliques in a graph (with pivoting).

Exception Summary
GraphException Class represents exceptions in graph-related methods in the graph package.
 

Package graph Description

graph package: a collection of classes for representing graphs, hyper-graphs and algorithms operating on such discrete finite structures.

Package specification

The graph package provides a reentrant (thread-safe) Graph class that represents directed (as well as undirected) graph objects, their nodes (Node class) and links (Link class) between them. It also provides an HGraph class representing hyper-graph objects, namely graphs whose edges may connect more than 2 nodes, and the related classes HNode and HLink. Several algorithms are implemented that operate on Graph or HGraph objects: 1. Dijkstra's Shortest Path algorithm 2. Bron-Kerbosch All Maximal Cliques finding algorithm (parallel implementation) 3. Kruskal's Minimal Spanning Tree algorithm Several other algorithms will be implemented in the next version of the library
  • hyperlink
